name: Hunters' Path
description:
Guide a squad of 17th Century zealots through haunted New England woodland, giving evil spooks a taste of steel and musket fire. 

Gather coins to trade for Holy Water, Silver Bullets, and Sacred Ashes - special holy weaponry suited to particular situations.

Encounter choices that could offer rewards, or a branching path. Will you use precious resources to give nearby dead last rites, or save it for a tough foe? Will this chest contain a pile of coins, or will it sprout teeth and give chase?

Classes:

  • Musketeer - single-shot musket, can use the Special Silver Bullets
  • Knight - armoured, has a short-range sword
  • Halberdier- uses a longer-ranged halberd
  • Gunner - armed with the latest (and slightly anachronistic) advances in technology - a sturdy Puckle Gun
  • Dragoon - uses a pepperbox percussion pistol
